mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Inspection (car_ID, inspect_Date, carWeight, carLength, inspectionTime, Overall_passed, weightPassed, CPLR_A_Height, CPLR_B_Height, CPLR_A_Action, CPLR_B_Action, Metal_Wheels_A, Metal_Wheels_B, Resist_Wheels_A, Resist_Wheels_B, Wheel_Gauge_A, Wheel_Gauge_B, Wheel_Tread_A, Wheel_Tread_B, Truck_screw_Loose_A, Truck_screw_Tight_B, car_sits_level, car_doesnt_rock, All_wheels_touch) VALUES (#{carId}, #{inspectionDate}, #{carWeight}, #{carLength}, #{inspectionTime}, #{overallPassed}, #{weightPassed}, #{couplerHeightA}, #{couplerHeightB}, #{couplerActionA}, #{couplerActionB}, #{metalWheelsA}, #{metalWheelsB}, #{resistWheelsA}, #{resistWheelsB}, #{wheelGaugeA}, #{wheelGaugeB}, #{wheelTreadA}, #{wheelTreadB}, #{truckScrewLooseA}, #{truckScrewTightB}, #{carSitsLevel}, #{carDoesntRock}, #{allWheelsTouch})

INSERT INTO Car (car_number, rpt_Mark, cplr_type, kit_type, car_type, prr_type, purchased, purchase_price, source, manufacturer, in_service, length, weight, aar_type, blt_date, car_color, description, rfid_tag, wheels) VALUES (#{carNumber}, #{reportingMarkID}, #{couplerTypeID}, #{kitTypeID}, #{carTypeID}, #{prrTypeID}, #{datePurchased}, #{purchasePrice}, #{vendor}, #{manufacturer}, #{dateInService}, #{carLength}, #{carWeight}, #{aarTypeID}, #{bltDate}, #{carColor}, #{description}, #{RFIDtag}, #{carWheels})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, car_number as carNumber, description, rpt_mark as reportingMarkID, cplr_Type as couplerTypeID, prr_type as prrTypeID, car_type as carTypeID, kit_type as kitTypeID, aar_type as aarTypeID, purchased as datePurchased, purchase_price as purchasePrice, source as vendor, manufacturer as manufacturer, kit_built as dateKitBuilt, in_service as dateInService, length as carLength, weight as carWeight, wheels as carWheels, rfid_tag as RFIDtag, blt_date as bltDate, car_color as carColor, last_updated as lastUpdat FROM CAR WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET description = #{description}, cplr_type = #{couplerTypeID}, car_number = #{carNumber}, prr_type = #{prrTypeID}, car_type = #{carTypeID}, kit_type = #{kitTypeID}, aar_type = #{aarTypeID}, purchased = #{datePurchased}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice}, source = #{vendor}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, kit_built = #{dateKitBuilt}, in_service = #{dateInService}, length = #{carLength}, weight = #{carWeight}, wheels = #{carWheels}, rfid_tag = #{RFIDtag}, last_updated = CURRENT TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bad_order (car_Id, Area_of_car, in_effect, out_of_service, date_entered, description) VALUES (#{carId}, #{problemArea}, #{inEffect}, #{outOfService}, #{entryDate}, #{problemDescription})
mapper.select: SELECT mark, car_number, Date_entered, COALESCE(a.type, 'None') AS carArea, bo.description as problemDescription, bo.id as problemNumber FROM car c INNER JOIN rpt_mark rm ON rm.id = c.rpt_mark INNER JOIN bad_order bo ON bo.car_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN car_area a ON bo.area_of_car = a.id WHERE c.id = #{carId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Maintenance (maint_date, car_id, area_of_car, closed_bad_orders, problem_desc, work_performed) VALUES (#{datePerformed}, #{carId}, #{carArea}, #{badOrdersClosed}, #{problemDescription}, #{workPerformed})
